name: Shichida-shiki Unou de Asobenture Vol. 3: Kotoba ABC: 2-4sai Muke
overview: Shichidashiki Unou de Adventure - Kotoba ABC - 2-4-sai Muke is an educational game specially designed for kids from 2 to 4 years old that follows Dr Makoto Shichida educational method. The game shows pictures and how the word is written in japanese and in english languages, the game also got another mode to construct the image or the word using a moving image. Professor Makoto Shichida is leading a worldwide revolution in education which is changing the way we understand children, their brain capabilities and their learning styles. He is a well-known figure in Japan, having committed the last 40 years to developing techniques to stimulate the early development of the brain. Dr Shichida was born in 1929 and holds a Doctorate in Education. Over the years, he has founded over 400 Child Academies in Japan. He has also written more than a hundred books (in Japanese), some of which remains on the bestsellers list in Japan.
